item.title: Holly add a quote by Jackson Browne
item.description: "Don't confront me with my failures, I had not forgotten them." -- Jackson Browne

item.title: Holly add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "But no one walks out of his family without reprisals: a family is too disciplined an army to offer compassion to its deserters." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Holly add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "You can safely assume you've created God in your own image when it turns out that God hates all the same people you do." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Holly add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Holly add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Holly add a quote by Don Miguel Ruiz
item.description: "Be impeccable with your word. Don't take anything personally. Don't make assumptions. Always do your best." -- Don Miguel Ruiz

item.title: Holly add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "If you can walk with the crowd and keep your virtue, or walk with Kings-nor lose the common touch; If neither foes nor loving friends can hurt you; If all men count with you, but none too much; If you can fill the unforgiving minute with 60 seconds worth of distance run- Yours is the earth and everything that's in it, And-which is more-you'll be a man my son." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Holly add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often." -- Mae West

item.title: Holly add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf." -- George Orwell

item.title: Holly add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "I have as much authority as the Pope. I just don’t have as many people who believe it." -- George Carlin

item.title: Holly add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Holly add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "The sea, the snotgreen sea, the scrotumtightening sea." -- James Joyce

item.title: Holly add a quote by A.J. Cronin
item.description: "Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, but only saps today of its strength." -- A.J. Cronin

item.title: Holly add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "There are few reasons for telling the truth, but for lying the number is infinite." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Holly add a quote by Anne Tyler
item.description: "I read so I can live more than one life in more than one place." -- Anne Tyler

item.title: Holly add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Holly add a quote by Alan Paton
item.description: "Sorrow is better than fear. Fear is a journey, a terrible journey. But, sorrow is at least an arriving. " -- Alan Paton
